name: Russian Warship Go Away
description:
You must destroy the russian ships to keep the citizens safe.

I just want to support my country in this terrible war which started 24 February 2022 by Russia. 

Controls: 

WASD - movement
Enter - shooting

Features: 
- 3 achievement badges

- an easter egg (oh yeah)

Graphics, programming, music and sounds by murchistudio.

Made in 10 hours for Mini Jam #108: Seaside.

Glory to Ukraine.
